Resource Hub

Quick support for Guard-connected kids, teens, and caregivers

Need a quick answer or a steady shoulder? These links point to the partners families lean on most. Everything opens in a new tab so you can keep exploring here.

Top resources

Trusted partners families call first

Browse by topic—from deployment prep to tutoring—and share links directly with the families you support.

Scholarship Database

Curated listings of scholarships for Iowa military-connected youth.

Open resource→

Acknowledgments: Emily Williams (Military Youth & Family Support VISTA) and Kristen Ferullo (Navy School Liaison) for their collaboration.

Iowa National Guard Mobile App (iOS)

Download the Iowa National Guard mobile app for iPhone to access news, events, and resources.

Open resource→

Ensure App Store badge follows branding.

Iowa National Guard Mobile App (Android)

Download the Iowa National Guard mobile app for Android to stay connected with updates and tools.

Open resource→

Verify Google Play badge assets are current.

Tutor.com (Military)

24/7 online tutoring and homework help for military families.

Open resource→

Note any usage rights for screenshots or logos.

Comprehensive support services for military members and families.

Open resource→

Check if a youth-program subpage is preferred.

Open resource→

Confirm link anchors correctly on mobile.

BGCA Mission Youth Outreach

Boys & Girls Clubs programming tailored to military-connected youth.

Open resource→

Add primary BGCA military page if needed.

Child Care Aware (Army)

Child care fee assistance and respite programs for Army families.

Open resource→

Monitor for URL updates each fiscal year.

Hy-Vee KidsFit

Wellness challenges and resources for youth and families from Hy-Vee KidsFit.

Open resource→

Request partner logo approval if highlighted.

Our Military Kids

Activity grants supporting children of deployed Guard and Reserve members.

Open resource→

Capture any application deadlines in notes.

ARNG Child & Youth Services

National Guard Child & Youth Services hub for programs and resources.

Open resource→

Confirm regional contacts referenced on site.

Iowa National Guard Warrior & Family Services

Comprehensive services and support for Iowa Guard members and families.

Open resource→

Check for deeper links to specific services.

Upwards Drill-Time Child Care

Pilot program providing no-cost childcare for military families during drill weekends and battle assemblies.

Open resource→

Crisis Text Line

Free, 24/7, confidential text-based mental health support for anyone in crisis. Text HELLO to 741741 to connect with a trained Crisis Counselor.

Open resource→

Verify inclusion of text number (741741) and ensure ADA-compliant contrast on graphics.

Scholarships & grants

Funding pathways for military-connected students

We keep track of scholarships and grants for Guard-connected students heading to college, trade schools, or certification programs. Share the database with families or ask us for a custom pull.

Open the scholarship database
